WRITING.TITLE: Ultimate Rebuild Series
WRITING.TEXT: Would anyone be interested if I did a series where I randomly chose a team, rebuilt it for three years, then randomly chose another team to do for another three years. There would be rules though. Like If I win a chip in the first year I would only do two seasons. Or I couldn't start as the Warriors or Cavs. Also let me know If I should use modern rosters or 1985 rosters. There are so many possibilities here. Credit to SixRingsofSteel the youtuber for inspiring me to do this with BBall GM. Not looking for comments, but looking for suggestions. (If you know what I mean)
Go to roster then go back in time. You can change what year of roster you are looking at in the top right. Unless you have already deleted the league.
